entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:51 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Stratford

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 06:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or ice pellets beginning early this afternoon then changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle late this evening. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming west 40 gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near noon then becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
